apihelp-centralauthtoken-description: Get ae centralauthtoken fer makin aen authenteecatit speirin tae aen attached wiki.
apihelp-deleteglobalaccount-param-reason: The raison fer delytin the uiser.
apihelp-globaluserrights-description: Eik/remuiv ae uiser tae/fae global groops.
apihelp-globaluserrights-example-1: Eik the uiser FooBot tae global groop "bot", n remui fae global groops "sysop" n "bureaucrat"
apihelp-globaluserrights-example-2: Eik the global uiser wi ID 123 tae the global groop "bot", n remuiv fae the global groops "sysop" n "bureaucrat"
apihelp-globaluserrights-param-add: Eik the uiser tae thir global groops.
apihelp-globaluserrights-param-remove: Remuiv the uiser fae thir global groops.
